text: 41 Ursae Majoris is a red giant star in the constellation Ursa Major. It is 690 light years from Earth. The apparent magnitude is 6.34. ==References== Category:Ursa Major (constellation) Ursae Majoris, 41 Category:M-type giants Category:Durchmusterung objects 093132 052685 4202
title: 41 Ursae Majoris
